attributes.readMe:
An avatar creation system using the Avataaars library with AI-powered character suggestions. Create customizable characters with detailed visual features and personalities.

**Visual Customization:**
- Hair styles (long, short, curly, straight, dreads, etc.)
- Hair colors (natural and fantasy colors like pastel pink, blue)
- Facial expressions (happy, surprised, wink, serious, etc.)
- Eyebrow styles (natural, angry, raised, unibrow, etc.)
- Mouth expressions (smile, concerned, tongue, grimace, etc.)
- Skin tones (pale to dark brown, including fantasy colors)
- Clothing options (blazers, hoodies, graphic shirts, v-necks, etc.)

**AI Character Suggestions:**
Built-in AI skill that suggests character feature combinations based on your preferences (casual, professional, fun, etc.) with reasoning for why features work well together.

**Usage:**
Create characters by selecting from dozens of visual options or ask the AI for suggestions. Perfect for games, storytelling, profile avatars, or any project needing diverse character representations.
attributes.title: CharacterCreator
